archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0983
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing Specialist, I require the ability to choose mail as an option for invoice deliery (as an exception for specific large customers, not available to all)

properties.value: We assume that pdfs are created and sent to printhouse, correct? Kiri: update that Jared advised printed bills are not in scope of DX.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
